channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: New: flake8-typechecking-import (0.5)
item.description: A flake plugin that checks for typing.TYPE_CHECKING-able imports
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comments (0.1.2)
item.description: Find redundant comments in Python code
